alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton; Rockdale; Walton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 6:14PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rockdale, central Henry, central Walton, north central Butts and Newton Counties through 645 PM EST... At 614 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Youth to near Magnet to Flippen, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... McDonough, Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Stockbridge, Loganville, Social Circle, Oxford, Porterdale, Walnut Grove, Mansfield, Between, Good Hope, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Ola, Worthville, Big Haynes Creek Park, Pannell and Flippen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for north central Georgia.
